sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Texinfo-&texinfo-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chmod, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm Gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, fgrep, grep Make: make Sed: sed Sh-utils: basename, echo, expr, hostname, sleep Texinfo: makeinfo Textutils: cat, tr
